name: Monster Mailbox
description:
The Monster Mailbox is a fun way to show your love for the hometown team!

Be the first on your street with a Monster Mailbox!

Comes with a complete set of decals and numbers for you to customize with your family name and street address!

This entire product is made in the U.S.A, made for a fan, by a fan!

Ships FedEx

All Monster Mailboxes are custom designed by hand, please allow 7-10 days for shipping.

name: AL East Standings
description:
Fenway Faithful, the Mini Standings is the slimmed down version of what you see on the Green Monstah. It's perfect for those that want to keep track of the Sox throughout the entire season. Use it daily and year after year, as it comes with with 135 magnets to interact with. Great for the home, office, dorm or bar.

 No assembly required
 Made of galvanized steel
 Mirror clips and screws included for hanging

Magnetic Mini Standings Stats:

 13 inches wide x 12 inches high
 135 magnets
 2 lbs

The AFC Magnetic Standings is the perfect way to track New Englands favorite football team year after year! 

A great gift  for any Pats fan!!

 Made of galvanized steel

Magnetic Mini Standings Stats:
 13 inches wide x 12 inches high

 Ships FedEx

 Please allow 7-10 days for shipping.

name: Original Fenway Magnetic Scoreboard
description:
This scale replica of the Fenway Park scoreboard is a great collectible for every Sox fan! Made entirely by hand, and the magnetic scoreboard is made of steel. 

A high level of detail has been given to each and every part of the scoreboard. The board includes the WB Mason logo, the famous morse code depicting Tom and Jean Yawkey, and even the lights indicating balls, strikes and outs which you can change with the placing of a magnet! 
 
The scoreboard comes complete with a set of over 400 magnets, team names, scoring numbers, pitcher numbers, and magnets to simulate the lights are all included. The board measures 8 feet by 1 foot when assembled. The board ships in two pieces and is easily hung with the hardware provided. Assembles in minutes! 

The Fenway Park scoreboard is the oldest manually operated scoreboard still active in the major leagues today. Since the scoreboards inception in 1912, the board has changed over the years to include the scoring of both the American and National leagues. Advertisements are now a recognizable aspect to the ends of the board. Recently the American league standings have been added to the length.

name: Mini Magnetic Fenway Scoreboard
description:
The Mini Magnetic Scoreboard shows the board as it was for many years.

Made of US steel. It weighs 2lbs and come with a full set of magnets to keep score season after season. 

Comes with hardware to hang, and installs in minutes.

Mini Scoreborad measures 12"x 28" and makes a great gift for any Sox fan!

Ships FedEx and please allow 7-10 days for shipping.

name: Standings- Scoreboard Combo
description:
The magnetic standings and scoreboard combo is a must have for every Boston fan! 
Be the man behind the board!
Score along all season year after year!

Made of U.S. steel 
Standings measure 42''x 12''
Comes with Hardware to hang and a full set of scoring magnets. 

Please provide FedEx shipping address at check-out.
